definitions: make unpleasantly rough or jarring to the senses
shortDefinitions: make unpleasantly rough or jarring to senses

definitions: make or become more cruel or severe

examples.text: legislation that will harshen sentences for petty crimes
his words harshened, admonishing those who live a double life

shortDefinitions: make or become more cruel or severe

definitions: (of a climate or conditions) become more difficult to survive in

examples.text: rivers run dry, climate harshens and pollution spreads

shortDefinitions: become more difficult to survive in

definitions: have an undesirably strong effect on
